name: JSON (JavaScript Object Notation); also ECMA-404, JSON Data Interchange Format
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">json</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: JSON is a lightweight, text-based, language-independent data interchange format. It was derived from the Javascript/ECMAScript programming language, but is programming language independent. JSON defines a small set of structuring rules for the portable representation of structured data.
